channel.title: Need help constructing this void

item.title: Need help constructing this void
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:
@ownageownt wrote:

I’m using Jukks Cleaned V3 and I’m not sure how to use this void. I’m trying to make fightcaves, so when you kill an npc another one spawns. I’m pretty sure this is how you make it. I need help though. If you can help, that would be great. =].

Note I need help constructing the newNPC part.

public void DeathAddNpc(int NPCID) { int EnemyX = server.npcHandler.npcs[npcs[NPCID].attacknpc].absX; int EnemyY = server.npcHandler.npcs[npcs[NPCID].attacknpc].absY; newNPC(NPCID, EnemyX, (EnemyY + 0), npcs[NPCID].heightLevel, EnemyX, EnemyY, EnemyX, EnemyY, 1, GetNpcListHP(NPCID), false); }

Read full topic
